thread.title: ‘Star Trek’ Lives Long and Prospers in Pop Culture

author: Don Steinberg
title: ‘Star Trek’ Lives Long and Prospers in Pop Culture
text:
“Star Trek” and “Star Wars” fans have debated the merits of the rival space franchises for decades, but while “The Last Jedi” has taken a lightsaber to its box-office competitors this winter, there is also a surprising glut of “Star Trek” sightings in popular culture.
“ ‘Star Wars’ is about legends. It’s about epic storytelling, whereas ‘Star Trek’ feels like it’s about us, our friendships,” says Michael Golamco.
He...
